title: How’s Canada Getting Away with This TYRANNY? | Guest: Ezra Levant | 4/12/21
description:
Nearly 100 company executives met to discuss opposing Republican-led voting reforms. Isn’t that fascism? You need an ID for everything, but not for voting? Elon Musk’s Achilles' heel seems to be labor unions. Glenn describes the family tragedy that led to his recent absence and the lessons he learned through it. Rebel News founder Ezra Levant joins to discuss how a Canadian pastor was jailed and his church barricaded for refusing to follow COVID restrictions. Meanwhile, Canadian journalists are being arrested if they attempt to cover the story. Glenn reviews President Biden’s latest gun control orders.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
